content:
That's a great list of tips for preparing my home for recovery. I'll definitely make sure to clear the clutter, create a recovery station, and stock up on essentials. I'll also prepare my bathroom and plan for meals and snacks in advance. It's also a good idea to arrange for help from friends and family, and to prepare my bed for comfort and accessibility. 

One thing I'm still a bit concerned about is managing my pain after the surgery. Can you provide some tips on how to manage pain effectively during the recovery period? I want to make sure I'm prepared and know what to expect.
